details.description:
Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk; Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Available 5/1 Small pets welcome No broker fee

amenities.pets: Small pets allowed, All pets allowed
amenities.other: Central A/C, Shared Outdoor Space, Hardwood Floors, Backyard, Garden, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Virtual tour available! Reside in a gorgeous 1 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's and more! Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
Available 4/1 Broker fee applies Small pets OK

Beautiful 1 bed / 1 bath apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta?s, Sweet Science, Honey?s, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the G train, and a short walk to the L train.
April 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
April 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

2 bed 1 bath in gorgeous area of Crown Heights
- Elevator building - Newly renovated - Huge bedroom - Big living area with window - On-site super - Stainless steel appliances
Available 4/1/2024 Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Myspace Exclusive!
This incredible one bed bedroom apartment is just south of the Williamsburg Bridge and short distance to some of the best restaurants and bars Brooklyn has to offer! The apartment has an L-shaped living area with big windows, stainless steel kitchen, exposed brick.
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat; hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
March 1 move in Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: hardwood floors, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large living room, 1 queen size bedroom and 1 full size bedroom. Gorgeous exposed brick. Heat; Hot Water is included. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available 8/1 On-Site Super Small pets OK

Beautiful Williamsburg apartment is available May 1st!
- 1 big bedroom - Real living room that fits a sofa /tv/coffee table and has natural light - Separate kitchen with full sized appliances - Exposed brick
ELEVATOR BUILDING!
Because this property is in a prime location, you will be conveniently close to the J, M, and G trains! You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Small pets only 5/1 move in No broker fee

MySpace exclusive! Spacious one bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Large living room perfect for entertaining. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere! Pies-n-Thighs, The Rosemont, Testo, Align Coffee, Williamsburg Pizza, Modern Love Vega, etc all nearby. Incredible Williamsburg location.
Available 5/1 Small pets OK! Broker fee applies

Awesome new 2 bedroom for November 1st! Rent stabilized!
- 2 big bedrooms - Large living area - Newly renovated
Laundry in building Shared roof deck
Perfect location! Birdy's, Hart Bar, Rebecca's Bar, Santa Panaza Italian, Lone Wolf, Marco's etc. JMZ only 1 block away.
May 1st move in Pets OK for additional fee

ONE-OF-A-KIND 2 bed / 1 bath TRIPLEX with large private roof terrace! TWENTY NINE FOOT HIGH ceilings with original brick detail throughout and the church?s original 120-year-old hand-painted tin ceiling!! Vaulted ceilings in this historic church building give it a large open feel. Must see in person to get the full size. If you can?t see the video please let me know and I?ll text it to you Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Large private terrace Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Spacious bedrooms and living room Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. There is an elevator to the roof shared roof deck but not to the apartment because there is no elevator in this part of the building. Up 2 flights. 4 laundry rooms , one on each floor. Pets ok No fee . Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!
Railroad style large 2br . Renovated kitchen and bath. Hardwood floors. Prime bushwick location next to trains.

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

Great apartment located in the heart of Bedstuy! 2 bedroom 1.5 bath with Yard!
Just a short walk to the J,M, Z subway lines, supermarket, shops, cafes, and much more.
Big open kitchen Hardwood floors and high ceilings Central air and heat is available
Big full bathroom plus a half bathroom
Reach out to schedule a showing!

details.description:
Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won't be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

Beautiful 2 BR/ 1.5 bath DUPLEX apartment in Crown Heights, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, and hardwood floors.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Franklin Park Bar, Screamer's Pizza, Memphis Seoul, Two Saints, or just walking along Eastern Parkway. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only a few blocks from the 2,3, 4, and 5 trains.
12/1 move in No broker fee

435 Marion St is a spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located in the vibrant neighborhood of Bed Stuy, Brooklyn. This beautiful apartment boasts a modern and stylish design, with high ceilings and large windows that allow for plenty of natural light to flood the space.
As you enter the apartment, you'll find yourself in a large and inviting living room, perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests. The open-plan kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, including a refrigerator, stove, and microwave, making it a breeze to prepare meals and entertain.
Located in the heart of Bed Stuy, this apartment is surrounded by a plethora of restaurants, cafes, bars, and shops. The neighborhood also offers easy access to public transportation, making it a convenient location for commuters.

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Microwave, Stainless steel appliances

details.description:
Beautiful renovated 2 bedroom apartment with 1 baths.
NICE kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and microwave. Hardwood floors throughout, closets, fantastic lighting and with windows in every room make this place awesome.
Only a block away from the Forest M train stop and a short walk to the Myrtle-Wyckoff L train stop. Norma?s Coffee Shop right around the corner and tons of shopping.
No FEE, Pets OK!

Spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment available at 1337 Gates Ave ? in the vibrant Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn. This pet-friendly unit boasts beautiful hardwood floors and ample natural lighting. The modern kitchen features sleek stone countertops and comes equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a convenient dishwasher and microwave.
You'll have access to a range of fantastic amenities within the building, making it an even more attractive living space. Enjoy the convenience of on-site laundry facilities, stay active in the fully-equipped gym, store your bicycle securely in the bike room, and take in stunning views from the rooftop area.
The location is excellent, with nearby subway stations including Gates Av (J), Myrtle ? Wyckoff Avs (L), and Knickerbocker Av (M), providing easy access to transportation. This is an opportunity you won't want to miss ? schedule a viewing today and make this fantastic apartment your new home!

Easily practice safe social distancing with your own?Private. Unobstructed. Views. Of Manhattan. Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

The perfect spot for a central Williamsburg vibe in a slightly quieter area! Don't worry though, that busy waterfront is only a short walk away :) Find all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. East Williamsburg is still an amazing, diverse, and community-centered neighborhood with great accessibility to almost any other Brooklyn area and a very easy commute to Manhattan. Conveniently located off the L, J. M, and G trains, as well as the B43, B46, B48, and B60 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck

This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE
